And FFS for all the idiots who are using AVG or another crappy antivirus software, stop using this website get out. There is no virus.

All of THETA's releases come up as false positives.
They're clean.

Whats coming up as a virus is the packager Theta uses, its a false positive, the AV's that report it as a virus usually are trying to stop piracy by tricking people into thinking files like this are a threat. I've never gotten a Virus from a Theta release. Plus I doubt someone with a Skull on TPB would upload virus filled files, would be a one way ticket to losing said skull and getting a ban most likely. Avast is a fairly good AV, and it doesn't detect it as a virus. Besides most big name Anti-virus programs make up false positives at random just so that you think its doing something. I wouldn't say it'd be too much fo a stretch to say that the AV companies themselves release half the viruses out there.

can this be played in multi player? if so how?

@ez100, yes you can with hamachi. You can Dl hamachi from this site too. FInd out the server hosts IP and connect to it. First you have to join their hamachi server using their username and pass to connect to their hamachi server. Then both of u have to keep hamachi running and just join. Make sure both of you have firewall turned off and most recent versions of hamachi. You can go to a menu in it to check for latest version. If one of you has firewall or non-updated version, then it won't work. I think you can play with regular servers too
